summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley confirming a meeting scheduled for September 2nd at the St. Regis hotel. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a disclaimer regarding attorney-client privilege.

keyFacts: The email confirms a meeting on September 2nd at the St. Regis hotel.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is prohibited.
